name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HireJoy - AI copilot for reviewing resumes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HireJoy is a GPT-4 powered AI tool for reviewing candidates more thoroughly than a human, in a fraction of the time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use HireJoy to score, screen, and save candidates. Spend less time reading resumes and more sourcing them. Our GPT-4 based AI understands technical requirements and explains why a candidate is a good fit.

Source Linkedin candidates with HireJoy chrome extension, or bulk upload resumes for scoring in our web app.

**Coming Soon**
- Push candidates you into your ATS.
